strings.Value: "You're quite a rarity. A dwarf rejecting Torag, a dwarf unable to forge a nail... I wouldn't be surprised to hear you don't enjoy ale!"

"I... No, I sometimes do bend my elbow. But much less now than in my bad days, after I ran away from my home, knowing no purpose, or where I should go. If I had a stronger will, perhaps I would forgo drinking completely."
